pages.text: $(li)Orcas are large, aquatic and neutral mammals with black and white blubbery skin that can be found in $(l:patchouli:biomes/overworld/water/cold_ocean)Cold Oceans$(/l) of the Overworld.$(br)$(li)They love hunt their preys, $(l:patchouli:creatures/alexsmobs/cachalot_whale)Cachalot Whale$(/l), they will jump out of the water to attack their prey and even break the $(l:patchouli:miscellaneous/vanilla/ice)Ice$(/l) to get to them.
$(li)Don't try to attack an Orca! Or all nearby Orcas will attack you!
$(li)When you are near of a Orca, you can obtain the rare $(l)Orca's Might$() effect which increases your attack speed.
